channel.title: Observer unable to see themselves attack someone else (No Apostle/Illusionist)
channel.description:
#### What happened?
So I was playing Alchemist in a cult/possessor game and on the first night I was attacked (I stoneskined) + psychic talked to me. The observer said they watched me and said I had no visitors that night and i know that psychics don't show up as visits, but my attacker also didn't show up.
Possessor claimed they used that observer to attack me night 1, so why didn't it show up for that observer that they visited me then?
#### Comments:
There was no Apostle on the 1st night as to when it happened (was a conversion mid game on a psychic).

item.title: Observer unable to see themselves attack someone else (No Apostle/Illusionist)
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Actually, I’ve saw myself get possessed to kill a Princess as Observer.

The devs must have changed something in the recent patch/it is a bug.

Read full topic
item.source: Observer unable to see themselves attack someone else (No Apostle/Illusionist)

item.title: Observer unable to see themselves attack someone else (No Apostle/Illusionist)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Obs don’t see themselves visit. Otherwise follow would always show themselves. It’s probably because of that.

Read full topic
item.source: Observer unable to see themselves attack someone else (No Apostle/Illusionist)
